content.en: Accelerating Medical Imaging: Researchers are exploring ways to optimize the reconstruction process in medical imaging using algorithms and graphics processing units (GPUs). They are investigating the optimal settings for iterative algebraic reconstruction methods, reducing reconstruction time in cone beam computed tomography (CBCT), and accelerating the forward projection and backprojection algorithms. By utilizing GPUs and other high-performance computing frameworks, these algorithms can be optimized to generate faster and more accurate results in various imaging techniques.
content.da: Fremskynde Medicinsk Billeddannelse: Forskere undersøger måder at optimere rekonstruktionsprocessen i medicinsk billeddannelse ved hjælp af algoritmer og grafikkort (GPU'er). De undersøger de optimale indstillinger for iterative algebraiske rekonstruktionsmetoder, reducerer rekonstruktionstiden i keglebjælke-computer-tomografi (CBCT), og accelererer algoritmerne for fremadprojicering og bagprojicering. Ved at anvende GPU'er og andre højtydende computerarkitekturer kan disse algoritmer optimeres til at generere hurtigere og mere nøjagtige resultater i forskellige billeddannelsesteknikker.
